item.description:
As the weather cools down I have been thinking of 'inside' activities. What better inside activity than a rousing game of scrabble? :) I have one deluxe scrabble board, and if the event fills we can play in teams. Or, if you have a scrabble board, we can have several games going at once. Feel free to bring a scrabble dictionary if you have one - because I don't! There is no set agenda for the night, just relaxing and fun.

Since this is a private residence there won't be food/alcohol provided, but feel free to bring your dinner, a snack or any special drinks for yourself.

Exact address and contact info will be emailed the day before. ;)

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Scrabble Night
